recipes.title: Paneer Butter Masala
ingredients: Spices (Garam Masala, Cumin, Coriander, Red Chili Powder)
recipes.method: 1. Sauté onions and tomatoes in butter. 2. Add cashews and spices, cook until fragrant. 3. Blend into a smooth paste. 4. Cook paneer cubes in the paste, add cream. 5. Simmer until the curry thickens. 6. Serve hot with naan or rice.

recipes.title: Chicken Biryani
recipes.method: 1. Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices. 2. Cook basmati rice separately. 3. Layer rice and chicken in a pot. 4. Garnish with saffron, mint, and coriander leaves. 5. Cook on low heat until the flavors meld. 6. Serve with raita.

recipes.title: Masoor Dal
recipes.method: 1. Cook masoor dal until tender. 2. Sauté onions, garlic, and ginger in ghee. 3. Add tomatoes and spices. 4. Combine with cooked dal. 5. Temper with mustard seeds and asafoetida. 6. Serve with rice or roti.

recipes.title: Aloo Gobi
recipes.method: 1. Sauté onions, ginger, and green chilies. 2. Add tomatoes and spices. 3. Stir in potatoes and cauliflower. 4. Cook until vegetables are tender. 5. Garnish with fresh coriander. 6. Serve with roti or rice.

recipes.title: Chana Masala
recipes.method: 1. Sauté onions, ginger, and garlic. 2. Add tomatoes and spices. 3. Stir in boiled chickpeas. 4. Simmer until flavors meld. 5. Garnish with green chilies and coriander leaves. 6. Serve with rice or naan.

recipes.title: Vegetable Biryani
recipes.method: 1. Cook basmati rice and vegetables separately. 2. Sauté onions and mix with yogurt and biryani masala. 3. Layer rice and vegetables in a pot. 4. Garnish with saffron, mint, and coriander leaves. 5. Cook on low heat until the flavors meld. 6. Serve with raita.

recipes.title: Palak Paneer
recipes.method: 1. Sauté onions, ginger, and garlic. 2. Add tomatoes and spices. 3. Add spinach and cook until wilted. 4. Blend into a smooth paste. 5. Cook paneer in the paste, add cream. 6. Serve hot with naan or rice.

recipes.title: Butter Chicken
recipes.method: 1. Sauté onions, ginger, and garlic in butter. 2. Add tomatoes, cashews, and spices. 3. Blend into a smooth paste. 4. Cook chicken in the paste, add cream. 5. Simmer until the curry thickens. 6. Serve with naan or rice.

recipes.title: Rajma Chawal
recipes.method: 1. Soak and boil kidney beans until tender. 2. Sauté onions, ginger, and garlic. 3. Add tomatoes and spices. 4. Combine with cooked kidney beans. 5. Simmer until flavors meld. 6. Garnish with coriander leaves and serve with rice.

recipes.title: Mutton Rogan Josh
recipes.method: 1. Sauté onions, ginger, and garlic. 2. Add tomatoes and spices. 3. Add yogurt and cook until oil separates. 4. Cook mutton until tender. 5. Garnish with fresh coriander. 6. Serve with naan or rice.

recipes.title: Vegetable Korma
recipes.method: 1. Sauté onions, ginger, and garlic. 2. Add tomatoes and cashews. 3. Add assorted vegetables and spices. 4. Cook until vegetables are tender. 5. Stir in coconut milk. 6. Serve hot with rice or roti.
